title: Herbie rides again
creator_credit: Robert Stevenson, Bill Walsh and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Another adventure with the VW with a mind of its own; Herbie. In this escapade Herbie comes to the assistance of a little old lady. They combine their efforts to stop a tycoon from building the world’s highest building on her property. Starring Helen Hayes, Ken Berry, Stefanie Powers, John McIntire and Keenan Wynn. Based on a story by Gordon Buford, screenplay by Bill Walsh.
